content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    pattern = match_all(r"```julia\n(.*)\n```", md)
    codes = [match[1] for match in pattern]
    return join(codes, "\n")
end
```

This function uses regular expressions to find all Julia code blocks in the markdown document `md`. It then extracts the content of each code block and stores them in an array. Finally, it joins the code blocks together with a newline character and returns the resulting string.
